sentences.sContent: The quality of the applicants varies widely.
sentences.sCn: 申请人的素质差异很大。

sentences.sContent: ...Moffitt explained that self-control problems were widely observed...
...The Paris agreement has been widely hailed as a positive step forward in addressing climate change for all...
...Although "Don't judge a book by its cover" is an old proverb widely acknowledged...
...“Goals are widely used and promoted as having really beneficial effects...
...Not enough sleep It is widely believed that sleep is for the brain...
...it is widely accepted that it has gained growing popularity among persons in all walks of life...

words.tran: 广泛的；宽的，广阔的；张大的；远离目标的
普遍的，广泛的；分布广的

trans.tranOther: to a large degree – used when talking about differences
